title: Torduff Reservoir Walking Route

images.title: Richard Webb / Torduff Reservoir.
images.caption: Torduff Reservoir. One of the earliest Edinburgh reservoirs, tucked into a steep cleuch behind Torphin Hill.

images.title: Stephen Craven / Overflow of Torduff reservoir
images.caption: Overflow of Torduff reservoir

images.title: M J Richardson / Dam of Torduff Reservoir
images.caption: Dam of the reservoir

images.title: michael ely / Path over Torduff Reservoir dam
images.caption: Path over the reservoir dam. Looking from Fernielaw Avenue.

description: Enjoy a circular walk around the pretty Torduff Reservoir on this walk in Edinburgh. You can start the walk from the parking area in Bonaly Country Park. From here it is a short stroll to the reservoir where you can pick up a 1.5 mile circular trail around the water. There's an impressive dam and lovely views of across the water to the surrounding Pentland Hills.  At the southern end there's also nice views of the adjacent Clubbiedean reservoir.
